title: Paris Hilton chats to handsome male friend | Daily Mail Online
text: She's proudly single for the first time in her life. But that doesn't mean Paris Hilton isn't above a little flirting. And the onetime reality star certainly seemed happy as she chatted to a handsome male pal on Friday afternoon. Scroll down for video 'I am in the best place of my life!' Paris Hilton chats to handsome male pal outside the Chateau Marmont on ... as she opens up about being single Smiling, the blonde businesswoman spent a few minutes with the suited man as they waited for their cars outside the Chateau Marmont on Sunset Boulevard on Friday afternoon. Paris had been attending Dr Barbara Sturm's pre-Oscars lunch inside the iconic hotel. Dressed in a smart black and white dress with court shoes, she seemed on top form, juggling two cell phones in her hand. Out and about: Dressed in a smart black and white dress with court shoes, she seemed on top form, juggling two cell phones in her hand The outing came as Paris opened up about her romantic life in an interview with Plastik magazine. A serial monogamist, she explained she was enjoying life as a single woman. 'It is the first time in my life being single,' she said, adding: 'so I am really focusing on my business and myself, and I am in the best place of my life.'
